section.title:
sales orders printing forms for
forms for sales orders Print Sales Order Form
section.para: To print a Sales Order Form, select the "Print Sales Order Form" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing a Sales Order Form, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Sales Order Number of the Sales Order whose Form you want to print.
Specify the Form you want to use for printing the Sales Order.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without generating a report, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
